plugin.name: Deepray-Radar
plugin.summary: Overlays the radar picture on OpenCPN
plugin.author: Hakan Svensson / Douwe Fokkema / Kees Verruijt / David S Register
plugin.source: Hakan Svensson / Douwe Fokkema / Kees Verruijt / David S Register
plugin.description:
Garmin, Navico et Raymarine radar support
WARNING: OPENGL MODE IS REQUIRED!
Works with Garmin HD, xHD, Navico BR24, 3G, 4G, HALOxx and several Raymarine radars.
When a compass heading is provided it will allow radar overlay on the chart(s). It also allows separate display of a traditional radar picture (PPI).
Supports (M)ARPA, Guard zones, AIS overlay on PPI, etc.
